name: Bullet Booper
description:
A bullet hell without movement! Redirect the incoming attacks of the World Eater to protect the Earth, and defeat the monster!

Sorry for the individual files, we were not familiar with itch.io and expected there to be a download all button. I hope that you will still take the time to download the individual files and enjoy the game!

Please ensure your scale (in display settings) is 100%, not more.

Made by a team of two, first game jam ever! First game ever, in fact. We hope you enjoy it!

*PS we noticed that there is a bug - if the first horizontally flying ball does not hit the enemy, then further attack patterns may not appear. Sorry for this!
